meanings.definition: A promise or assurance that something will happen or be done.
meanings.sent1: The guarantied made by the company gave us confidence in their product.
meanings.sent2: The guarantied of a full refund if not satisfied is clearly stated in the contract.
meanings.sent3: The guarantied of sunny weather for the picnic turned out to be a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a guarantied of her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The guarantied of a magical adventure in the book captured my imagination.

meanings.definition: To provide a formal assurance or promise, especially that certain conditions will be fulfilled.
meanings.sent1: He guarantied to finish the project by the deadline.
meanings.sent2: The company guarantied a free replacement if the product was damaged.
meanings.sent3: She guarantied to bring homemade cookies to the party.
meanings.sent4: His dedication guarantied success in his endeavors.
meanings.sent5: The chef guarantied a delicious meal for the event.

meanings.definition: To serve as a guarantee or assurance of something.
meanings.sent1: The new security system guarantied the safety of the building.
meanings.sent2: His reputation guarantied the quality of his work.
meanings.sent3: The lucky charm guarantied good luck in the competition.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse guarantied safe passage for ships in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The certificate guarantied the authenticity of the artwork.
